::Zardus/Mosquitor::

Zardus growls, turning as he hears an Ocipite again and sees her fire a bolt at Hurricane. He aims his rifle, firing three shots dead-on at her head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A bunch of footsteps come from behind Hurricane as Mosquitor gets excited and runs forward.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Ocipite:
> 
> "Don't bet it, toaster-brain" shouted The femme while she started to 
> absorb Hurricane's discharge it was enough to charge her energy's 
> weapons and she shot higher-powered bolt of energy around to his 
> spark, enough to knock him out.
